code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{flatDeep,slugify,containsObject}from'../../../utils';import PostData from'../../../data/blog/PostData.json';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CategoryOne=function CategoryOne(props){var cats=PostData.map(function(item){return item.categories;});var singleCatArray=flatDeep(cats);var categories=[];singleCatArray.forEach(function(cat){var obj={title:cat.trim(),slug:slugify(cat),count:1};var objIndex=containsObject(obj,categories);if(objIndex!==-1){var prevCount=categories[objIndex].count;categories[objIndex]={title:cat.trim(),slug:slugify(cat),count:prevCount+1};}else{categories.push(obj);}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"edu-blog-widget".concat(props.style2==='enable'?'-2':''," widget-categories ").concat(props.extraClass||''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"widget-title",children:"Categories"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"category-list",children:categories.slice(0,5).map(function(cat){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/category/".concat(cat.slug),children:[cat.title,/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["(",cat.count,")"]})]})},cat.slug);})})})]})});};export default CategoryOne;
